article_title: Cardinal Care’s rising costs, waiver deadline prompt student concerns

og.description: The latest increase in the cost of Cardinal Care — and the University’s refusal to delay a waiver de...
og.title: Cardinal Care’s rising costs, waiver deadline prompt student concerns

twitter.description: The latest increase in the cost of Cardinal Care — and the University’s refusal to delay a waiver deadline that would preclude students from using California’s new health insurance exchange to find cheaper insurance — was met with discontent among graduate and international students while also prompting efforts on their part to mitigate the burden.
twitter.title: Cardinal Care’s rising costs, waiver deadline prompt student concerns
twitter.creator: @Stanford_Daily
